text: @marcorubio Sadly none of this is Good News. It means 40% were #asymptomatic transmitting #Coronavirus & others are in #Hospital for the virus. Maybe you @GovRonDeSantis @SenRickScott @POTUS see that but I’m not ignorant. Anyone? @DrDenaGrayson @drsanjaygupta this is good? https://t.co/MG9tEApdn4
